enchantment.fancyenchantments.gift_of_fi: Deals more damage to enemies on fire, but less damage when you are in water
enchantment.fancyenchantments.pyromaniac: When you would take explosion damage, you will be healed instead
enchantment.fancyenchantments.eater_of_s: The damage increases with Kill Count, but the enemies will not drop exp
enchantment.fancyenchantments.solid_as_a: Increases armor and toughness when holding a shield
enchantment.fancyenchantments.ocean_curr: Increases attack speed, increases more in water,may be ineffective when on fire
enchantment.fancyenchantments.overflow.d: Killing enemies has a probability of generating a puddle of water at their death location
enchantment.fancyenchantments.fire_disas: Killing enemies has a probability of generating a fire at their death location
enchantment.fancyenchantments.the_fallen: Weapon damage increases with the number of curse enchantments.
enchantment.fancyenchantments.empathy.de: Now you understand how arrows feel...
enchantment.fancyenchantments.rolling_st: Reduces damage taken and causes damage to enemies collided with while sprinting
enchantment.fancyenchantments.blessed_wi: Slightly increases movement speed, increase speed and step height while sprinting
enchantment.fancyenchantments.heavy_blow: Chance to hit a heavy blow,slightly reduce attack speed
enchantment.fancyenchantments.wind_blade: Increases damage by percentage based on movement speed attribute,slightly reduce attack damage
enchantment.fancyenchantments.floating.d: Reduce damage when the player is stationary
enchantment.fancyenchantments.cumbersome: After the attack, there is a probability that the player will attack slowly for a period of time
enchantment.fancyenchantments.bullying.d: One hit kills a baby creature
enchantment.fancyenchantments.dominion.d: The power of a weapon increases with sum of its enchantment levels
enchantment.fancyenchantments.bloodthirs: Feeling hungry, obtaining saturation from slaughter
enchantment.fancyenchantments.falling_st: Fall from a height to cause damage to enemies and avoid falling injuries
enchantment.fancyenchantments.feather_fa: Sneaking in the air to gain a Slow Falling effect
enchantment.fancyenchantments.unyielding: Get extra survival time before death, kill monsters to resurrect
enchantment.fancyenchantments.cursed_gaz: Give the monsters you gaze upon weakness and slowness effects
